title: Drowned Hearts
description: "Life for life. Hearts for hearts. Sounds fair, does it not?"Viola goes on a daring hunt for mermaids to find her mother, lost at sea, when a goddess of the dark tides offers her help. But the price of salvaging what's been drowned is steep, and Viola must protect her own heart before it, too, is lost beyond the waves.
author: Karen Lykkebo
